recipes.title: Roasted Chicken Quarter Recipe
recipes.description: Roasted chicken quarter is an easy roasted chicken recipe that anyone can prepare. It only involves a simple marinade mixture and a conventional oven. The result of this recipe is simply awesome.
instructions: Combine lemon juice, thyme, rosemary, parsley, garlic, poultry seasoning, salt, pepper, and olive oil. Mix well
Rub the mixture on the chicken quarters. Let stand for 1 hour (place inside the fridge to avoid contamination).
Preheat oven to 370 degrees Fahrenheit.
Arrange the chicken in a roasting pan.
Roast for 60 to 80 minutes (time will depend on the thickness).Baste with remaining mixture every 20 minutes while roasting.
Chop into serving pieces.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 2 teaspoons chopped fresh flat leaf parsley

recipes.title: Ampalaya Salad Recipe
recipes.description: Ampalaya Salad or bitter gourd salad is a side dish composed of sliced bitter gourd, red onion, and tomato. This is best eaten with fried fish or other fried seafood dishes.
instructions: Rub the salt all over the sliced bitter gourd. Let it stay for 30 minutes.
Remove the salt by quickly washing the gourd with running water. Drain the excess liquid.
Combine vinegar, ground black pepper, sugar, and extra salt (if needed) in a bowl. Stir.
Put-in the bitter gourd, onion, and tomato in a bowl. Mix well.
Cover the bowl with a cling wrap and then refrigerate for about 3 hours.
Serve as a side dish for fried fish.
Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 medium bitter gourd ampalaya, thinly sliced
1 medium Roma tomato diced and seeds removed

recipes.title: Spicy Pork Adobo Recipe
recipes.description: Spicy Pork Adobo is a twist on the regular pork adobo recipe. This version has a much bolder flavor and a little kick courtesy of the dry red chilies.
instructions: Heat the oil in a pan.
Brown the garlic.
Add-in the pork and then cook for 3 to 5 minutes or until light brown.
Pour-in soy sauce, oyster sauce, and water. Stir and then let boil.
Add the dry red chili, whole peppercorn, and bay leaves. Cover and the simmer for 40 to 45 minutes
Pour-in vinegar and allow to re-boil
Add sugar and salt. Stir and then cook for 3 minutes.
Transfer to a serving plate.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Sardines with Chayote Recipe
recipes.description: Sardines with Chayote is a common everyday dish. This has been a favorite among majority of Filipino households because of its low cost and satisfying taste. Aside from sardinas with misua and patola, this dish is also a pleaser, if you are a fan of canned sardines in tomato sauce.
instructions: Heat the oil in a pan.
When the oil becomes hot, saute the garlic until it turns light brown.
Add the onion and chayote. Cook for 3 minutes.
Put-in sardines, water, fish sauce, and pepper. Stir. Cook for 3 to 5 minutes.
Transfer to a serving bowl. You can also top this over a cup of warm steamed white rice.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Chicken Galantina Recipe
recipes.description: Chicken Galantina is a popular Filipino Holiday Stuffed Chicken recipe. This dish is best enjoyed cold and can be eaten with either bread or rice.
instructions: Combine ground pork, ham, Vienna sausage, bell pepper, carrot, onion, raisins, sweet pickle relish, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
Add the bread crumbs and then continue mixing. Set aside.
Combine lemon juice and soy sauce in a large container. Stir.
Marinate the whole chicken in the lemon and soy sauce mixture for 30 minutes.
Remove the chicken from the mixture and then stuff with half of the meat and vegetable mixture.
Arrange the boiled eggs and Chinese sausage inside the chicken and then continue to put-in the rest of the meat mixture.
Secure the chicken by wrapping it in a cheese cloth and tying both ends of the cloth with a kitchen twine.
Meanwhile, boil about 1 to 1 1/2 quarts of water in a steamer.
Steam the chicken for 90 minutes.
Let the chicken cool down and then refrigerate for 3 to 6 hours.
Slice into serving pieces.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Helpful Tips on How to Become a Chef
recipes.description: Are you pondering about how to become a chef? If you want to jump into the culinary world, then you should not let anything stop you. If others can do it, then so can you. It is true that being a chef can be very fulfilling. There is pleasure in seeing the happy faces of people who are impressed with the meal you prepared. There is pride in seeing the intricately designed cakes and astoundingly presented dishes. You would not only enjoy a lucrative profession, you will also be able to showcase your skills and creativity to thousands of people.

recipes.title: What is a Kitchen Twine?
recipes.description: In some cases, it would be necessary to do some tying and knotting when preparing food. That is why, it is important to keep a kitchen twine in the kitchen which you could easily pull out if you happen to need one. But what is kitchen twine?

recipes.title: Where to Attend Cooking Classes in Vancouver
recipes.description: All cooking enthusiasts and aspiring chefs in Vancouver no longer have to search too far just to find a class or program to enroll into. Because of the astounding reputation of schools in this place, all it takes is some little research to be able to discover which cooking classes Vancouver should be picked.

recipes.title: Pastry Chef Training Overview
recipes.description: Becoming a pastry chef starts with wanting and deciding to focus on creating cakes, pies, sweets and other types of dessert. This profession is very exciting because it is not just all about culinary. It is also a form of art which allows the chef to assemble dessert and pastries that look like a true work of an artist. It involves not just skills in preparing food but also entail a lot of creativity.

recipes.title: The Best Cooking Classes in Toronto
recipes.description: Finding cooking classes Toronto which will fit your preferences will not be such a daunting task. Toronto is a place which has rich resources when it comes to various types of food—from vegetable to seafood, spices and other ingredients. That is primarily the reason why this place has a rich food culture. Another significant characteristic about food and dining in Toronto is that people are so inclined to eating healthy.

recipes.title: Sapin Sapin Recipe
recipes.description: Sapin sapin is a Filipino rice cake made from glutinous rice and coconut milk. This delicious sapin sapin recipe is composed of layers each with a different color and flavor. Normally, sapin-sapin is composed of 3 layers: the bottom layer is colored yellow and has the flavor of ripe jackfruit; the middle layer is white and has the flavor of young coconut or just plain coconut milk; the topmost layer is violet in color and has the flavor of purple yam.
instructions: In a large mixing bowl, combine glutinous rice flour and sugar. Mix well.
Pour-in the condensed milk, coconut milk, and vanilla extract. Mix until the texture becomes smooth.
Divide the mixture into 3 parts.
Add the mashed purple yam and ube extract on the first part along with the violet food coloring. Stir thoroughly and then set aside.

Shred the jackfruit (without the seed) in a food processor. Add the processed jackfruit on the second part along with the yellow coloring and then mix well. Set aside. Note: leave the 3rd part as it is.
Arrange the steamer on your stovetop and pour-in about 1 quart of water. Turn on the heat and let the water boil.
Grease a round baking pan by brushing cooking oil or coconut oil.
Pour-in the first part (colored violet) on the greased baking pan. Make sure that the mixture settles. Cover the baking pan with a cheesecloth and then steam for 12 to 16 minutes.

Remove the baking pan and then pour-in the white mixture. Use a spatula to spread it on top of the violet mixture. Remove excess water from the cheesecloth by squeezing it. Put it back on the baking pan. Steam for another 12 to 16 minutes.

Remove the baking pan from the steamer and then pour-in the yellow mixture. Spread the mixture over the succeeding one using a spatula. Try to remove the excess water again from the cloth and then put it back on the baking pan. Steam for 15 to 20 minutes. Note: If you think that the mixture is still a bit runny, try to steam for 5 minutes more.

Arrange a clean banana leaf over a wide serving plate. Brush coconut or cooking oil on the leaf. Use a spatula (brushed with oil) and gently run on the side of the baking pan to prevent the mixture from sticking. Turn the baking pan over the banana leaf and let the cooked sapin-sapin fall.
Brush oil on top of the sapin-sapin (the violet part should be on top). Sprinkle with latik.
Serve for dessert. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon cooking oil or coconut oil

recipes.title: Creamy Seafood Pasta Recipe
recipes.description: Creamy Seafood Pasta is a delicious creamy pasta dish that makes use of linguine, shrimp, bay scallops, mussels, and clams. This is a comforting dish that you can enjoy for lunch or dinner. If you love Shrimp Alfredo pasta, then you will adore this dish.
instructions: Arrange the cooked linguine in a serving plate.
Make the white sauce by melting the butter in a sauce pan.
Add the flour, stir and then cook for 1 minute in low heat.
Pour-in the milk and continuously stir until the texture becomes soft. Set Aside.
Heat olive oil in a pan.
Sauté onion and garlic
Add the shrimp and bay scallops. Cook for 2 minutes.
Put-in the mussels and clams. Cook for 3 minutes.
Pour-in the white wine and let boil.
Pour-in the white sauce. Stir and then add the parmesan cheese. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Top the sauce and seafood over the linguine. Garnish with chopped parsley.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 lb. linguine cooked according to package instructions
1 lb. large shrimp peeled and deveined

recipes.title: Paella Mixta Recipe
recipes.description: Paella Mixta or Mixed Paella is another delicious Paella Variation that I enjoy eating. This recipe involves both seafood and meat. Other seafood paella versions that do not have meat are Paella Marinera, Paella de Mariscos, and Seafood Paella.
instructions: Make the clam juice by boiling the mussels and clams in 1 1/2 cups water for 5 minutes. Separate the clams from the liquid. Set aside.
Make the paste by combining the garlic, parsley, and paprika. Pound until the texture becomes smooth. Pour-in 1 1/2 teaspoons olive oil. Mix well and then set aside.
Heat 1/4 cup olive oil in a paellera.
Pan-fry the shrimp for about 1 minute per side. Remove the shrimp and then set aside.
Sauté the onion and tomato until the texture becomes soft.
Put-in the chicken, rabbit meat, and chorizo. Cook for 5 minutes.
Pour-in the chicken broth and clam juice. Let boil. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes. Add water as necessary.
Put-in the garlic paste mixture and the saffron. Stir. Add salt and pepper as needed.
Put-in the Calasparra rice and green peas. Let the liquid re-boil and then lower the heat. Cook for 20 to 25 minutes covered.
Arrange the mussels, clams, red bell pepper strips, and shrimp on top.
Serve with lemon wedges.
Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups juice from boiled clams and mussels
1/2 lb. large shrimp with heads and shell
1 small red bell pepper seeded, grilled, and sliced into strips
1 1/2 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil for the paste
1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil for sautéing

recipes.title: Vegetable Fried Rice Recipe
recipes.description: Vegetable Fried Rice is an easy fried rice recipe involving vegetables and white rice. This dish can be prepared quickly and can be eaten with any main dish that you desire. Aside from this healthy fried rice dish, there are several fried rice recipes that you can browse and try. Click here to see our collection of fried rice recipes.
instructions: Combine salt and rice. Gently mix using your hands.
Heat a wide frying pan and then pour-in the olive oil.
When the oil turns hot, stir-fry the peppers, carrots, and broccoli for 1 minute.
Add the rice and then cook for 5 to 6 minutes while continuously stirring. This will prevent the rice from sticking on the pan.
Transfer to a serving plate.
Serve with the main course. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Easy Chicken Tinola Recipe
recipes.description: Tinola is a Filipino Chicken Soup Dish. This easy chicken tinola recipe is composed of chicken and vegetables along with a good amount of ginger. There are many ways to prepare Chicken Tinola. This recipe is another way of making this cold weather favorite in a much easier way using alternative ingredients.
instructions: Heat the cooking oil in a cooking pot.
When the oil becomes hot, sauté the ginger, garlic and onion
Once the onion is soft, put-in the chopped chicken. Cook for 3 minutes.
Pour-in the chicken broth. Let boil and then simmer for 20 to 25 minutes.
Add the chayote wedges. Cook for 5 minutes.
Put-in the hot pepper and/or malunggay leaves.
Add the ground black pepper and fish sauce. Stir.
Transfer to a serving bowl.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 3 pieces chayote peeled, seed removed, and sliced into wedges
2 tablespoons ginger sliced into thin strips

recipes.title: Corn Chowder Recipe
recipes.description: Corn Chowder is a type of thick soup or vegetable stew. This is made from cream style corn along with some bacon or prosciutto.
instructions: Heat the cooking oil in a small cooking pot.
Put-in prosciutto or bacon. Cook until the texture becomes crisp.
Add-in onions. Cook until the texture becomes soft.
Put-in the potato. Cook for 2 minutes.
Pour-in the water and cream-style corn. Let boil and then simmer for 15 to 18 minutes.
Add half and half, salt, and pepper. Stir and then cook for 1 minute.
Transfer to a serving bowl. Top with cheese.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 2 medium baking potatoes peeled and diced
A pinch of ground black pepper

recipes.title: Tuna Frittata Recipe
recipes.description: Tuna Frittata is a baked egg dish. This is composed of canned tuna, beaten eggs, and cheese. I love to have his for breakfast along with toast or muffins.
instructions: Grease a 9" inch pie dish by pouring-over cooking oil and rubbing it on the surface.
Combine eggs, tuna, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
Pour-mixture on the pie dish.
Preheat oven to 370 degrees Fahrenheit
Bake for 12 to 14 minutes.
Sprinkle the cheese on top. Set the oven to broil and then continue broiling for 3 minutes.
Serve with toasted bread. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Tonkatsu Sauce
recipes.description: As we know by now, Tonkatsu is a popular Asian breaded fried pork dish. Making it is simple, so is its taste. The secret to a good tasting Tonkatsu lies in the Tonkatsu Sauce.
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl.
Stir the ingredients using a spoon.
Place the bowl in a microwave oven and then microwave for 15 to 20 seconds.
Stir once more and then serve with Tonkatsu.

recipes.title: Bachelors Culinary Arts Degree
recipes.description: Getting a culinary arts degree is the initial step in reaching one’s aspiration to become a culinary expert, a professional chef or a renowned hotelier. If you are also considering going into a culinary arts program and eventually earning your degree, you need to understand that there are also various areas which subdivide the culinary realm. When you get into the school, you will realize that you need to decide about specialization—whether it is pastry making, international cooking or others. You also have to know what you intend to become after finishing the degree. Do you want to work in hotels and restaurants, be an expert in creating intricate cakes and pastries or manage an establishment?

recipes.title: Top Cooking Classes in Boston
recipes.description: Are you in search for the top cooking classes Boston? Then this is a task that is way too easy to accomplish. For people who have keen interest on cooking or to those who would like to venture into the culinary profession, there is an almost endless list of schools and institutions to choose from. All it takes is picking the one which will perfectly match one’s preferences.

recipes.title: What is an Executive Chef?
recipes.description: Executive chefs plays a very significant role in the kitchen. This position is crucial for any restaurant, hotel, café or other establishments that are related to food service. Yes, for the elites and bourgeoisie, an executive chef in their home kitchen is extremely important too.

recipes.title: How to Choose a Pastry Chef School
recipes.description: How to Choose a Pastry Chef School? The culinary world is composed of various areas of expertise too and pastry making is one of those aspects. Are you inclined to focus on creating delightful pastries and mouth-watering sweets? Whether you want to open a small shop for pastries, be employed by the most renowned bakeshops or make desserts for the family, you would need to enroll in a pastry school.

recipes.title: Rice Health Benefits
recipes.description: Rice is a staple food particularly in Asian countries. This is the perfect companion for a myriad of viands because of how it balances out the taste and enhance the flavor. Yes, there are some people who are trying to cut down their daily intake of rice. Though, you need to know that this is not really harmful for your health. In fact, with proper and moderated intake, this will enable you to enjoy a whole lot of rice health benefits.

recipes.title: What is a Spatula?
recipes.description: If people are asked if they have a spatula in their kitchen, most are so quick to answer yes. But really, what is a spatula? Are you sure that you have one at home?

recipes.title: Health Benefits of Cucumbers
recipes.description: Cucumbers may have originated in India but this vegetable is widely popular across the globe today. It is one of the most well-loved vegetables because of how it garnishes a lot of different recipes. Aside from that, the flavor is very pleasing too.

recipes.title: The French Culinary Institute (ICC)
recipes.description: French Culinary Institute is one of the best in the world today. It is also recognized as the International Culinary Center. They have established a reputation as one of the best schools for international cuisine, culinary arts and other related areas within the field like pastry making and restaurant management.

recipes.title: Minnesota Culinary Schools
recipes.description: Finding a reputable culinary school in Minnesota is a simple thing to do. This state is the home for the most revered institutions that are known across the globe. People who are dreaming of eventually becoming a chef or a manager for a hotel no longer need to go far just to fulfill their wishes. For some who simply want to transform their home kitchen to a wondrous place where sumptuous meals are made, there are also certificate and diploma programs which will contribute in enriching one’s culinary knowledge.

recipes.title: Walnuts Health Benefits
recipes.description: Of all the different types of nuts, walnuts are the ones which are most scrutinized by scientists and most popular among nutritionists. What makes walnuts the center of attraction?

recipes.title: Health Benefits of Coconut
recipes.description: The coconut tree is also referred to as “The Tree of Life”. It is because all parts of this tree, from the roots to the leaves and fruits, can be used in many ways. Calling it The Tree of Life, is just fitting because of all the amazing health benefits of coconut. That is why, it is important to include this in your daily diet too.

recipes.title: What is a Kitchen Scale?
recipes.description: What is a kitchen scale? What is its difference from the typical bathroom weighing scale? It is true that a kitchen scale has the same mechanism as the typical weighing scale. However, it is not recommended to use the usual weighing scale because of issues with accuracy.

recipes.title: Chicken Salad Wrap
recipes.description: Chicken Salad Wrap is simply chicken salad wrapped in tortilla. You can use either flour or corn tortilla for this recipe.
instructions: Combine the celery, chicken, salt, and pepper in a large mixing bowl.
Put-in the lime juice and mayonnaise. Fold the mixture to mix all the ingredients.
Arrange 2 leaf lettuces over the tortilla wrap.
Scoop half of the chicken mixture on top of the lettuce. Fold the opposite sides of the tortilla and roll starting from the end of the unfolded side until the chicken salad is completely secured.
Serve with chips.
Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups boiled boneless chicken breast cubed

recipes.title: Easy Porterhouse Steak Recipe
recipes.description: Porterhouse steak is a type of steak that is cut from the short loin. There is quite a number of recipes for this cut, but the best is still the simplest. This Easy Porterhouse Steak Recipe is still the way to go.
instructions: Rub the olive oil over the steak slices.
Combine salt and pepper and then rub all over the steak. Let it stand for 30 minutes.
Heat-up the grill. Arrange the steaks and grill for 8 minutes per side. Note: going beyond 8 minutes will make your steak less juicy.
Let the grilled steak rest for 5 to 7 minutes.
Transfer to individual plates and then serve with mashed potato and your favorite steak sauce.
Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 2 pieces Porterhouse steak about 12 to 16 ounces per piece

recipes.title: Vinegar Health Benefits
recipes.description: What will the kitchen be like without vinegar? For sure, the dishes would lack flavor and there are far too many recipes that you would not be able to prepare. Have you ever paused for a while to ask what your overall health would be like without vinegar? It is okay not to know the answer to this one because a lot of other people also do not realize the vinegar health benefits.

recipes.title: Which Culinary Institute Offers the Best Baking Classes?
recipes.description: Baking is more than just coming up with all sorts of sweets and fancy cakes. It is a form of art that delights all senses using gastronomic creations. Some people would say that baking is merely a hobby. The truth is, this is not just a wonderful method of beating stress but also a great way to establish a really profitable business. Whether you are into baking as a hobby or it is for profit, the good news is that there are a lot of excellent baking classes which will make your sweet dreams come true. Gone are the days when baking means experimenting with recipes in your own kitchen just to come up with the right mix. All it takes now is finding a culinary institute that will help you hone your skills and will teach you the secret techniques in baking.

recipes.title: Health Benefits of Watermelon
recipes.description: Watermelon is almost synonymous to summertime. Indeed, this juicy fruit and its vibrant color truly matches the intense heat of the sun. Thankfully, this fruit is already available almost all year round. If you simply adore eating this, then you would certainly be thrilled to know that you no longer have to wait for summer before you can enjoy the health benefits of watermelon.

recipes.title: What is a Melon Baller?
recipes.description: Are you wondering what a melon baller is? It does sound like a name for a child’s toy but really, this is a handy kitchen tool. It looks similar to the ordinary teaspoon but it has a tip that is spherical in shape. It is not used for eating but for preparing ingredients.

recipes.title: What Is a Pressure Cooker?
recipes.description: If you do not habitually spend so much time on the kitchen, you would probably find yourself asking, what is a pressure cooker? Pressure cooker is a convenient invention because this helps a lot in preparing more complex dishes in less time. This is often a big pot which comes with a lid that can be tightly closed and sealed. The lid does not allow water or air to pass through once it is locked in place, so a vent is necessary. Since steam tends to come out of the pot when food is being cooked, the lid also has a small spout on top where air can go out.

recipes.title: Spirulina health benefits
recipes.description: Have you heard about spirulina and its health benefits? Spirulina is a form of micro algae that are taken as health supplement. It is said to be a cure to some major diseases, but it still remains to be proven. It is true, though, that it has many nutrients which could be beneficial for the body. However, major claims need to be backed-up and confirmed. As of the moment, let us take spirulina as one regular supplement that can and may improve our health.

recipes.title: Health Benefits of Kale
recipes.description: The health benefits of kale are not known to many. Are you one of those who are still wondering how this could help you out in improving your overall health? This powerhouse vegetable really has so much vitamins and mineral in it, that eating it would be like dosing on all the essential nutrients that the body needs.

recipes.title: Baked Lobster Tail Recipe
recipes.description: Baked Lobster Tail is a quick and easy way to prepare a lobster dinner. This recipe is straightforward and can easily be followed even by amateur cooks.
instructions: Preheat oven to 360 degree Fahrenheit.
Make a vertical slit on the lobster tail using a pair of kitchen shears. Start from the top part moving towards the tail end.
Expose the lobster meat by gently pulling the sides created by the slit in opposite directions. Pull the meat using your hands. Do not completely remove the meat.
Arrange the lobster in a baking tray (tray should have an elevated border)
Combine salt, pepper, butter, and parsley in a bowl.
Using a basting brush, brush the butter mixture over the exposed meat of the lobster
Pour water on the baking tray where the lobster tails are sitting.
Bake for 22 to 25 minutes.
Let cool and then transfer to a serving plate.
Serve with lemon butter sauce. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 4 pieces lobster tails 6 to 8 oz. each
A pinch of ground black pepper

recipes.title: Tonkatsu Recipe
recipes.description: Tonkatsu is a popular Asian breaded pork chop recipe that is usually consumed for lunch. This dish is simple and quick to prepare.
instructions: Rub some salt and pepper on the pork chops. Let stand for 15 minutes.
Heat the cooking oil in a frying pan.
Coat the pork chops with flour and then dip in the beaten egg mixture.
Coat the pork chop with Panko bread crumbs. Make sure that all sides are completely coated.
Fry one side of the Tonkatsu in low to medium heat until the color turns golden brown (about 6 to 9 minutes)and them flip to cook the other side.
Arrange in a serving plate with shredded cabbage and Tonkatsu sauce.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 4 individual portions of boneless pork chops

recipes.title: Filipino Pork Fried Rice Recipe
recipes.description: Filipino Pork Fried Rice is another Fried Rice Recipe that I love having for breakfast. This recipe is almost like garlic fried rice, except that this particular one has pork in it.
instructions: Combine pork slices and soy sauce. Mix and let stand for 30 minutes.
Combine salt and rice. Gently mix using your hands. Set aside.
Heat a wide pan and then pour-in the cooking oil.
Put-in the garlic. Cook until medium brown.
Remove the garlic and then set aside.
Put-in the pork (including the marinade). Cook in low to medium heat for 5 minutes.
Increase the heat to med-high. Put-in the rice. Cook for 5 to 7 minutes while stirring almost continuously to prevent the rice from sticking at the bottom.
Add half of the fried garlic. Stir and then cook for a minute more.
Transfer to a serving plate. Top with remaining fried garlic.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 4 to 5 cups cooked white rice preferably cold

recipes.title: Easy Seared Scallops
recipes.description: Easy seared scallops is a quick and relatively easy appetizer recipe. This can be enjoyed just as it is or by dipping in lemon butter sauce. Aside from being an appetizer, this can be consumed as a main dish along with some greens on the side.
instructions: Sprinkle salt and pepper on the scallops. Gently rub the seasoning and let it stay for 5 minutes.
Melt the butter in a pan and then add the olive oil.
When the butter and oil mixture becomes hot, sear each side of the scallops until both sides are golden to dark brown.
Serve as an appetizer.
Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Cabbage Health Benefits
recipes.description: It is quite interesting to know that cabbage is actually referred to as “Drug of the Poor” during the medieval times. This is primarily because people back then rely on this vegetable for curing a lot of common ailments.

recipes.title: California Culinary Academy
recipes.description: California Culinary Academy has remained as one of the finest and most reputable California Culinary Institutions  when it comes to the culinary field. The main campus is located at Rhode Island Street, San Francisco, California.

recipes.title: Other Health Benefits of Cherries
recipes.description: Other Health Benefits of Cherries: these yummy fruit are great addition to various dishes and desserts because of how it can easily turn something from boring to extremely appetizing. Its bright red color and round shape really delights the senses and excites the taste buds. But do you know that there is more to this fruit than just meets the eye?

recipes.title: What Is Bran?
recipes.description: Have you ever paused for a while and asked, what is bran? How come this is recommended by nutritionists and fitness experts? How can this help you improve your overall health?

recipes.title: Health Benefits of Beets
recipes.description: If you have always loved munching on beets, then you might be totally exhilarated to know all the wonderful things that this could do to your health. Yes, this is not just any other food because there are far too many health benefits of beets.

recipes.title: What is a Dutch Oven?
recipes.description: Have you ever heard about a Dutch oven? Are you also wondering what is a Dutch oven? Contrary to its name, this is not really a type of over but a kind of pot. It looks somewhat similar to the typical pots that you use on a daily basis. It has a main tub and comes with a lid. The primary difference is that this is made of thick walls and heavy material. Usually, cast iron is used for making this type of pot to achieve the needed thickness and durability.

recipes.title: Lengua Con Setas Recipe
recipes.description: Lengua Con Setas or Ox Tongue with mushroom is a delicious stew that everyone can enjoy. Ox tongue is a delicacy that should not be looked down by those who don’t like the idea. In fact, the tongue is one of the tastiest parts of the cow.
instructions: Boil the Ox tongue in about 1 quart of water for 90 minutes or until tender (you can use a pressure cooker to quickly tenderize it).
Let the tongue cool down, and then scrape out the skin.
Slice the tongue into serving pieces.
Heat oil in a cooking pot.
Saute onion and garlic.
When the onion becomes soft, put-in the Ox tongue. Cook for 3 minutes.
Add oyster sauce, soy sauce, sugar, and Worcestershire sauce. Stir and then simmer for a minute.
Add the mushrooms and Pour-in water. Let boil and then simmer until the liquid reduces.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Put-in the cornstarch and water mixture. Stir. Cook until the sauce thickens.
Transfer to a serving plate. Sprinkle parsley flakes on top.
Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon cornstarch mixed with 2 tablespoons cold water

recipes.title: Pineapple and Soy Sauce Pork Pot Roast
recipes.description: Pineapple and Soy Sauce Pork Pot Roast is a tangy pork recipe that can be compared to pork hamonado and pork asado except that this dish is served whole and requires a Dutch oven.
instructions: Heat the cooking oil in a Dutch oven.
Saute the onion until it becomes soft.
Put-in the pork and cook until all the sides turns light brown (you will need to turn the pork until all sides are done).
put-in crushed pineapple, soy sauce, sugar, salt, pepper, rosemary, and water. Let boil and then simmer for 45 minutes.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit.
Put the Dutch oven inside the oven and then roast for 35 to 40 minutes (you can add more water if the liquid is not enough).
Remove from the oven and then transfer to a serving plate.
Serve with rice. share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Ground Beef Spaghetti Alfredo
recipes.description: Ground beef spaghetti alfredo is a delicious and budget friendly recipe that can be easily prepared anytime. This makes use of regular spaghetti noodles along with ground beef and Alfredo sauce. I am positive that you will like this dish.
instructions: Melt butter in a wide pan.
Add-in garlic. Cook for 20 seconds.
Put-in ground beef. Stir and then brown the beef (about 5 to 7 minutes).
Pour-in heavy cream. Let boil and then simmer for 15 minutes (add water as necessary).
Put-in 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese. Stir.
Arrange spaghetti noodles in a serving plate. Top with remaining Parmesan cheese and chopped parsley.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 lb. spaghetti noodles cooked according to package instructions

recipes.title: Top Culinary Schools in Virginia
recipes.description: Richmond may be bursting with so much energy but the rest of Virginia has preserved a quintessential charm. It is true that the food and cuisine in a specific place is reflective of the society. Virginia has a rich history which dates back to the indigenous groups called Powhatan to the Native Americans. Even the Europeans and Africans have left traces of their culture and tradition in this place. Because of the mixture of multiple cultures, even the dishes and cuisine in Virginia have vast diversity. The food scene in Virginia is full of color. Thanks to the Top Culinary Schools in Virginia which never cease to produce top quality Chefs.

recipes.title: Mushroom Health Benefits
recipes.description: Who doesn’t like mushrooms? With all the varieties to choose from, anyone can find a mushroom type which will suit his/her preference. Are you fond of mushrooms too?

recipes.title: Most Effective Metabolism Boosting Foods
recipes.description: Do you find yourself lacking energy everyday? Do you want to speed up your metabolism so you could lose a little weight? Believe it or not, there is no need to rely on pills and chemical supplements just to make your metabolism work double-time. These will only worsen things. Truth is, choosing the right types of food to eat will do wonderful things for you metabolism.

recipes.title: Health Benefits of Pomegranate
recipes.description: The health benefits of pomegranate should not be underestimated. Because of all the positive things that this could do to one’s body, it has been added to the list of wonder fruits. Should you really add this to your regular diet? What are the benefits that you will be able to enjoy when you eat this?

recipes.title: What Is an Infrared Fryer?
recipes.description: The infrared fryer may sound like it is something that can only be seen in sci-fi movies and cartoons but it’s not. What is an infrared fryer? Is it an ultra-modern apparatus that is way too complex to use? More importantly, is it a safe method of preparing food?

recipes.title: Lechon Sisig Recipe
recipes.description: Lechon Sisig is a dish made from leftover lechon or roasted pig. This sisig version can be enjoyed as a main dish with rice, along with calamansi and hot sauce. This also makes a good pulutan.
instructions: Melt the margarine in a frying pan.
Put-in onion and then cook for 2 minutes or until soft.
Add the lechon. Stir.
Put-in garlic powder, soy sauce, salt, and pepper. Stir. Cook for 5 to 6 minutes in high heat.
Add the mayonnaise. Stir and then cook for 3 minutes.
Transfer to a serving plate. You can squeeze lime or calamansi and add hot sauce if desired.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Chicken Soup Recipe
recipes.description: Chicken Soup is not only delicious and comforting; it also has healing and soothing properties. This easy recipe will guide you in preparing your own chicken soup in no time.
instructions: Boil the water in a wide cooking pot.
Put-in the chicken, carrots, celery, and onion. Simmer for 1 hour.
Remove the chicken and vegetables leaving the stock. Shred the meat of the chicken and discard the bones and then slice the carrots, celery, and onion.
Put everything back in the cooking pot along with the chicken stock and then apply heat.
Let the chicken stock re-boil (add a few cups of water, if necessary).
Add the rotini pasta. Cook for 15 minutes.
Transfer to individual bowls.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Easy Ham and Green Peas Saute
recipes.description: Ham and Green Peas Sauté is a Quick and Easy Recipe that can be prepared for lunch. This goes well with steamed white or brown rice.
instructions: Heat the oil in a pan.
Put-in the ham and then cook for 2 minutes while stirring after every 30 seconds.
Add soy sauce, oyster sauce, and water. Stir and simmer until the liquid completely evaporates.
Put-in green peas, bell pepper, and dried parsley. Gently stir. Cook covered in low to medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Serve with steamed white rice.
Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Health Benefits of Olive Oil
recipes.description: Celebrity chefs, dieticians, fitness trainers and trusted physicians are all recommending the use of olive oil. What is with this type of oil that makes everyone so impressed with it? After all, when you look at it, there is not much difference compared to the ordinary cooking oil. Why should you switch to olive oil too?

recipes.title: The Best Cooking Classes in NYC
recipes.description: Amidst the hustle and bustle of New York City are venues where the best cooking classes are held. Individuals who are in search for more knowledge when it comes to cooking and other areas of culinary do not need to go far just to find a class that they can enroll into. Whether you are looking for in-depth culinary training to become a professional chef or some fun classes for recreation, the cooking classes NYC are way too easy to find.

recipes.title: Strawberry Health Benefits
recipes.description: Because of the bountiful strawberry health benefits, this fruit is considered as a super fruit. Yes, even without genetic modification, this fruit is naturally packed with a whole lot of benefits for the body. If you have been skipping on this fruit, then it is time for you to do some alterations on your diet.

recipes.title: How Much is the Average Chef Salary?
recipes.description: It has been said too many times that chef salary surmounts to a whopping amount of cash. This is also the reason why some people decide to venture into this profession. Truth be told, the promise of big salary should not be the sole reason for wanting to become a chef. It should also be about interest and passion. Aside from that, if you are aspiring to become a chef, it is best to set your expectations right when it comes to potential salary. That way, your mind would not be clouded by incorrect assumptions and you would not end up disappointed in the future.

recipes.title: Sous Chef Training Overview
recipes.description: Novice chefs typically aspire to become the chief (executive chef) in the near future. However, before they get to that position, it is necessary to go through being a sous chef first. Being a sous chef means playing the role as second in command in the kitchen. Hence, this is a necessary step before one could become the chief.

recipes.title: Health Benefits of Dates
recipes.description: It is probably impossible to discuss all the health benefits of dates in this article. However, I tried to gather all the information that I can and summarize them.

recipes.title: Chicken Fried Rice Recipe
recipes.description: Chicken Fried Rice is a quick and easy Fried Rice Recipe that you can prepare anytime. This recipe uses boneless chicken breast which is low in fat and high in protein.
instructions: Combine salt and rice. Mix gently using your clean hands. Do not mash.
Heat the cooking oil in a wok.
When the oil is hot, put-in the chicken. Stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Pour-in the soy sauce, green peas, and carrots. Cook for 1 minute.
Add the rice. Cook for 7 to 8 minutes while gently stirring once in awhile.
Serve hot. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 5 cups cooked white rice leftover preferred
4 ounces boneless chicken breasts thinly sliced

recipes.title: Chili Shrimp Recipe
recipes.description: Chili Shrimp is a delicious shrimp dish that is best eaten with steamed white rice. This dish is very tasty, so expect to consume more rice.
instructions: Heat the oil in a pan.
Sauté the garlic and ginger
Put-in the shrimp. Stir and then cook for 1 minute.
Add the ketchup, hot sauce, chili sauce, and hoisin sauce. Stir. Cook for 2 to 4 minutes.
Pour-in the fish sauce and some sesame oil.
Add the leeks. Stir and then cook for 3 to 5 minutes.
Transfer to a serving plate. Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 lb. shrimp with head and shell, cleaned
a few drops of sesame oil

recipes.title: Lugaw Recipe
recipes.description: Lugaw or plain congee is the most basic congee recipe that only requires rice, water, and salt. This version is somewhat upgraded because I used an ingredient that improves the flavor of the dish – Rousong.
instructions: Pour water in a cooking pot. Bring to a boil.
Put-in the rice. Continue cooking for 30 minutes or until the texture becomes thick, while stirring once in awhile.
Add the salt, stir and then cook for 2 minutes more.
Transfer to a serving bowl. Top with a tablespoon of rousing.
Serve hot. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Sta. Fe Dip Recipe
recipes.description: Do you love potato chips or tortilla chips? If you do, you’ll love them even more, after trying this rich and delicious Sta. Fe Dip recipe. This will surely add life and excitement in your every bite.
instructions: Arrange the ingredients in a large bowl starting with the refried beans, salsa con queso (or cheese dip), guacamole,sour cream, pico de gallo (or chunky salsa), green chiles, and black olives.
Place inside the fridge for 3 hours.
Serve with your favorite corn chips, tortilla chips, potato chips, or even fries.
Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Ground Beef Basil and Tomato Frittata
recipes.description: Ground Beef Basil and Tomato Frittata is another easy frittata recipe that you can cook for breakfast or lunch. As the name suggests, this recipe requires ground beef, basil, and tomato slices. I enjoy eating this egg dish with a slice of toasted bread and some tomato ketchup.
instructions: Heat the oil in a pan. Put-in the beef and then cook for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add the basil. Cook for 1 minute. Turn the heat off and Let the beef cool down.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
In a large mixing bowl, combine eggs, cooked beef and basil, tomato, salt, and pepper. Beat.
Pour the mixture into an oval baking pan.
Bake for 20 to 30 minutes, or until the mixture rises and becomes solid. Do not over bake.
Serve with tomato ketchup.
Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Carne Asada Burrito Recipe
recipes.description: Care for some Carne Asada Burrito? I know that you won’t let this chance pass, so I made sure that you’ll find our easy burrito recipe here.
instructions: Cover the flour tortillas using a paper towel. Microwave for 30 seconds
On every flour tortilla, arrange the carne asada, rice, pico de gallo, bell pepper, guacamole, sour cream, and top with cheese.
Fold 2 opposite sides of the tortilla wrap by 3 inches, and then roll the unfolded sides until it forms a cylinder and the contents are sealed.
Transfer to a serving plate with lime sliced.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1/2 cup roasted bell pepper sliced into strips (optional)

recipes.title: Crab Dip Recipe
recipes.description: Crab Dip is a rich tasting dip recipe that you can serve with your favorite chips during any occasion be it a super bowl party, hosting game day, or even during ordinary days.
instructions: Combine all the ingredient in an oven and microwave safe bowl.
Microwave for 1 minute. Gently fold until all the ingredients are well distributed.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
Bake the mixture for 15 to 20 minutes or until the top turns light brown.
Serve with your favorite chips or bread.
Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon concentrated crab boil seasoning liquid

recipes.title: Pancit Habhab Recipe
recipes.description: Pancit Habhab or Pancit Lucban is a pancit version that originated from the Quezon province. This noodle dish might look like the traditional Pancit Canton, but there are some notable differences.
instructions: Heat 3 tablespoons of cooking oil in a wide cooking pot.
Stir-fry the chayote, snap pea, carrots, and bok choy for 3 to 4 minutes. Set aside.
On the same cooking pot, add remaining oil. Put-in the pork slices. Cook for 5 minutes or until the oil from the pork comes out.
Put-in the onion and garlic. Cook for 2 minutes.
Add the liver. Stir.
Add the shrimp. Cook each side for 1 minute. Remove the shrimp and then set aside.
Sprinkle the ground black pepper and pour-in soy sauce.
Pour-in the beef broth. Let boil. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Put-in the Miki Lucban noodles. Cook while stirring until the noodles absorbs the liquid.
Add half of the stir-fried vegetables. Stir.
Arrange on top of each banana leaf and then top with shrimp and more vegetables.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1/2 lb. pork belly thinly sliced and chopped
1 cup bok choy or pechay, chopped
1 cup snap pea or snow pea
Banana leaf cleaned and cut into 5 x 5 inch pieces

recipes.title: Century Egg Congee with Salted Pork
recipes.description: Century Egg Congee is a type of rice porridge with slices of black eggs and some chopped scallions. The egg is known as Century Egg or Hundred Year Old Egg.
instructions: Rub salt all over the pork. Let it stand for 1 to 2 hours.
Steam the salted pork for 30 to 40 minutes.
Let the pork cool down and then shred the pork using your fingers. Set Aside.
Prepare the congee by combining 4 to 5 cups of water with the chicken stock in a large cooking pot. Boil.
Add the rice and then wait for the liquid to re-boil. Stir every 5 minutes. Continue cooking in medium heat until porridge-like texture is achieved (usually about 30 minutes or more).
Transfer the congee in an individual serving bowl. Top with sliced century egg, shredded salted pork, and scallions.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Cilantro Lime Rice
recipes.description: Cilantro Lime Rice is a fresh tasting side for dishes like Carne Asada. This can also be a component for burrito.
instructions: Combine cilantro, garlic, lime juice, and olive oil in a food processor.
Shred the mixture for 20 seconds.
Combine the shredded mixture with the cooked white rice along with the salt. Mix well.
Transfer to a serving bowl.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Health Benefits of Carrots
recipes.description: Carrots are essential in various recipes not just because of the color that it adds to the dish but also because of the positive health effects that it could bring. If you have been skipping on this vegetable, you might want to change your mind immediately. That is, if you do not want to miss out on all the health benefits of carrots.

recipes.title: Adobong Dilaw Recipe (Yellow Adobo)
recipes.description: Adobong Dilaw is a pork adobo version that does not use soy sauce. Instead, it uses turmeric which is a type of rhizome that belongs to the ginger family. It is known as “luyang dilaw” in Filipino.
instructions: Heat the cooking oil in a cooking pot.
Put-in the garlic and then cook until the color turns light brown.
Add the onion. Cook for 1 minute.
Put-in the sliced turmeric, peppercorn, and bay leaves. Cook for 10 to 15 seconds.
Add the pork slices. Cook while stirring once in a while until the pork turns light brown (about 5 minutes).
Put-in the pork or beef cube (or powder) and the pour-in the water. Let boil.
Cover the pot and then simmer for 30 to 45 minutes (add additional water as necessary).
Pour-in the vinegar. Allow the liquid to re-boil.
Stir and then add the sugar. Cook for a minute more.
Transfer to a serving plate.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 piece pork or beef cube or 2 teaspoons beef powder

recipes.title: Chicken Salad with Apples and Grapes
recipes.description: Chicken Salad with Apples and Grapes is a rich salad recipe that you can have for lunch. This can be eaten as it is or with some salad greens.
instructions: Combine the chicken, celery, apple, and grapes in a large mixing bowl.
Add the mayonnaise and lemon juice. Gently fold the mixture until every ingredient well distributed.
Sprinkle salt and pepper and then fold until the salt and pepper are distributed.
Transfer to a serving bowl.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 2 cups boiled boneless chicken breast cubed

recipes.title: Braised Pork Ribs Recipe
recipes.description: Braised Pork Ribs is a delicious rib recipe that you can easily prepare for your family. This dish is tender, delightful, and is best served with white rice.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a cooking pot.
When the oil becomes hot, saute the onion.
Put-in the pork ribs. Cook for about 3 minutes.
Pour-in red wine and beef broth. Let boil.
Add the carrots and thyme. Simmer for 45 minutes.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Transfer to a serving plate.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Longganisa Fried Rice
recipes.description: Longganissa Fried Rice is a fried rice version using Longganisa (Filipino Sausage). This is best eaten during breakfast.
instructions: Combine the rice, salt, and garlic powder. Gently mash the mixture until the rice breaks apart and all the ingredients are well distributed.
Heat the oil in a wide frying pan.
When the oil becomes hot, put-in the chopped longganisa. Cook for 2 minutes.
Put-in the mashed rice. Cook for 5 minutes in medium heat while stirring once in awhile.
Make a space in the pan by putting the rice on one side.
Crack the eggs and then put in the open space of the pan. Let the eggs cook and then chop using the tip of your spatula.
Gently mix the eggs with the rest of the Ingredients.
Pour-in the soy sauce. Stir and then cook for one minute.
Transfer to a serving plate.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 3 pieces longganisa removed from the casing and the chopped

recipes.title: Tuna Salad Wrap
recipes.description: Tuna Salad Wrap is a flour tortilla wrap with tuna salad inside. This makes a good lunch along with homemade potato chips or fries.
instructions: Combine the tuna salad and cheddar cheese. Mix well.
Arrange 2 leaf lettuces over one tortilla wrap and then put-in half of the chopped tomato.
Arrange 3/4 cup of the tuna salad and cheese mixture over the chopped tomatoes.
Fold 2 opposite ends of the wrap (about 3 inches). Roll starting on the unfolded side until the contents are wrapped properly.
Slice half of the wrap crosswise using a knife and then arrange in a serving plate.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups tuna salad get recipe here
2 pieces 10 to 12 inches flour tortilla wrap

recipes.title: Creamed Spinach Recipe
recipes.description: Creamed Spinach is a delicious and easy to prepare side dish that is best eaten with roast chicken.
instructions: Melt butter in a pan.
Add garlic and then cook until the color turns light brown.
Put-in spinach. Stir.
Sprinkle salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Cook for 3 minutes while stirring.
Pour-in heavy whipping cream. Continue cooking for 5 to 7 minutes in medium heat while stirring every 2 minutes.
Transfer to a serving plate. Serve.
Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Fish Ball Soup Recipe
recipes.description: Fish Ball Soup is a nice tasting fish soup with scallions and bok choy. Minced fish fillet is made into a ball by adding tapioca starch and minced scallions.
instructions: Boil the vegetable broth in a large cooking pot.
Put-in the onions and simmer for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, make the fish paste by combining the fish fillet, tapioca starch, salt, and pepper in a food processor. Mince the mixture until the texture becomes soft.
Transfer the mixture in a mixing bowl. Add the minced scallions and ice cubes. Mix well using your hands until the mixture becomes thick.

Make a ball out of the mixture by grabbing a handful using your hand. Make an “O” shaped opening using your thumb and index finger. Gently squeeze your hand until the mixture exits the opening. Use a spoon to scoop the mixture.
Place the scooped mixture in the simmering broth. Continue to simmer until the balls float.
Add the chopped scallions and bok choy. Cook for 5 to 7 minutes.
Pour in the fish sauce. Stir.
Transfer to a serving bowl.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Chicken Spring Roll Recipe
recipes.description: This Chicken Spring Roll recipe is another spring roll variation using ground chicken. Compared to the other spring rolls that we featured, this version has lesser cholesterol content.
instructions: In a large mixing bowl, combine chicken, onion, carrot, parsley, garlic powder, sesame oil, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
Scoop about 2 to 3 tablespoons of the mixture and then arrange on top of a spring roll wrapper. Wrap the mixture and then seal the edge by brushing the beaten egg mixture in the end of the wrapper.
Heat the cooking oil in a deep frying pan.
When the oil becomes hot, deep fry the wrapped spring rolls in low to medium heat for about 10 to 12 minutes or until the color turns golden brown.
Transfer the fried chicken spring roll in a plate lined with paper towel.
Serve with sweet and sour sauce or banana ketchup.
Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: T-Bone Steak Sauteed with Onions
recipes.description: T-Bone steak sautéed with onions is a quick and easy steak dish that you can prepare for dinner. Aside from T-Bone, this dish can also be made with other beef steak cuts.
instructions: Slice the steak into thick strips.
Heat a pan and then pour-in olive oil.
When the oil becomes hot, put-in the onion and then sauté for 2 minutes.
Add the sliced steak. Pour-in the Worcestershire sauce. Sprinkle salt and pepper. Stir and then cook for 3 minutes in medium heat.
Transfer to a serving plate. Top with French fried onions.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 lb. T-Bone steak or any steak cut, grilled medium rare

recipes.title: Bagoong Rice Recipe
recipes.description: Bagoong Rice is a type of fried rice dish that makes use of shrimp paste or bagoong. This original version of this dish is of Thai origin. However, and since we love bagoong, I made a real quick and easy version of the recipe that everyone can enjoy.
instructions: Heat a frying pan.
Sear the sliced pork belly by putting them directly in the hot pan and cooking them until oil comes out. This should take about 2 to 5 minutes.
Add 1 tablespoon of bagoong guisado and then stir. Cook for a minute and then remove from the pan and set aside.
Pour the oil in the same frying pan.
When the oil becomes hot, put-in the garlic and then cook for 15 seconds.
Add 2 tablespoons of shrimp paste and then cook for 30 seconds in medium heat.
Put-in the rice. Gently mix while cooking until all the ingredients are distributed properly. Cook the rice for 10 minutes while gently scraping the bottom of the pan once in a while.
Transfer the rice to a serving bowl. Top with the cooked pork belly, chopped green mango, and chopped scallions.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 3 tablespoons bagoong guisado or bottled shrimp paste

recipes.title: Watermelon Health Benefits
recipes.description: Watermelon is an all-time favorite fruit for people of all ages. Its juicy meat is a refreshing snack or dessert. This can also be made into a thirst-quenching juice which can really calm the senses. Though watermelon may be strongly associated with summer months, the good news is that these days, it can already be found in the market all year round. It means that there should be nothing that could stop your from enjoying the watermelon health benefits any time of the year.

recipes.title: Paella de Marisco Recipe
recipes.description: Paella de Marisco is another delicious variation of seafood paella. This recipe produces a superior end result that you will surely enjoy.
instructions: Crush the garlic and pound until smooth.
Add the parsley and continue to pound until desired smooth consistency is reached.
Pour-in olive oil and add paprika. Mix well and then set aside.
Heat the olive oil in a paellera (paella pan) using medium to high heat.
Pan Fry the fish fillet until both sides turns light brown.
Remove the fish from the pan and then chop into small pieces. Set side.
Meanwhile, fry both sides of the shrimp until the color turns orange.
Remove the shrimp from the pan. Set aside.
Sauté the onion, scallion, and red bell pepper
Add the tomato and cook until it becomes soft.
Pour-in the clam juice. Let boil.
Add the garlic, parsley, and paprika mixture and the Spanish saffron. Stir.
Put-in the paella rice. Allow the liquid to re-boil.
Add the chopped pan fried fish fillet and salt. Stir.
Adjust the heat to low. Let the rice cook for 20 to 25 minutes (you can cover the pan if the rice is taking too long to cook).
Arrange the mussels, clams, shrimp, and roasted red bell pepper on top of the rice.
Cover the paellera with aluminum foil and then turn the heat off.
Serve with lemon wedges on the side.
Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1/2 small red bell pepper roasted and sliced into strips
1 ½ tablespoons olive oil for the garlic paste

recipes.title: Grilled Brined Pork Chop Recipe
recipes.description: Grilled Brined Pork Chop is a simple pork chop recipe that you can prepare for lunch or dinner. This recipe will give you a tender and moist pork chop that you will definitely enjoy.
instructions: Make the brine by combing ice cold water, sugar, and salt in a large container. Mix well.
Soak the pork chops in the brine mixture for 14 hours. (minimum of 3 hours)
Combine olive oil, garlic powder, and ground black pepper. Mix well.
Coat the pork chops with the olive oil mixture and then marinate for an hour.
Grill each side of the pork chops for about 7 minutes or until he color turns brown. Do this while basting using the excess olive oil mixture.
Serve. Share and enjoy.

recipes.title: Pico de Gallo Recipe
recipes.description: Pico de Gallo or Salsa Freca is a fresh tasting side dish that is usually enjoyed as a condiment. This can also be considered as a salad and is best enjoyed with grilled pork and warm rice.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine tomatoes and onion. Gently toss to mix.
Add the chopped cilantro, garlic, and jalapeno.
Squeeze-in the lime juice and sprinkle the salt. Mix well.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 1 medium onion white or red, diced

recipes.title: Broccoli Health Benefits
recipes.description: Broccoli may not be the most enticing vegetable, which proves the saying that, “You should not judge a book by its cover”. It may not be aesthetically appealing but knowing the broccoli health benefits will have you smitten in no time.

recipes.title: Health Benefits of Apples
recipes.description: Have you heard about the saying, “An apple a day keeps the doctor away”? If you have, then you better start believing it. With all the health benefits of apples, you surely would not have to visit your doctor for a very very long time.

recipes.title: Carne Asada Fried Rice
recipes.description: Carne Asada Fried Rice is an easy fried rice recipe that you can make with carne asada. This fried rice variation can be made using leftover carne asada. If you have some extra meat from the tacos that you prepared your dinner, you can transform it into a delicious fried rice dish for breakfast.
instructions: Combine salt and leftover rice. Gently mix until fully incorporated.
Heat the oil in a wide pan.
When the oil is hot, put-in the carne asada. Cook for 20 seconds (so that the oil can absorb the flavor).
Add the rice and then stir while frying. Cook for 5 to 7 minutes.
Put-in the ground cumin and dried parsley. Cook while stirring for 8 to 10 minutes.
Transfer to a serving plate. Serve with your main dish.
Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Pineapple Pork Stir Fry
recipes.description: Pineapple Pork Stir Fry is another delicious stir-fry variation that you will like. The dish involves thin pork slices stir-fried with pineapple chunks, carrots, bell pepper, and broccoli. This is best eaten with fried rice, but plain steamed rice will do.
instructions: Separate the juice from the pineapple chunks. Set the chunks aside.
Combine the pineapple juice, pork, and 1 teaspoon salt. Mix and then marinate for 3 hours.
Heat oil in a wok
When the oil becomes hot, add-in the ginger and then cook for 10 seconds.
Add the garlic and onion. Cook until the onion becomes soft.
Drain excess liquid from the marinated pork, and then put the pork in the wok. Stir fry for 3 minutes or until the color of the pork becomes light to medium brown.
Add Hoisin sauce, soy sauce, and oyster sauce. Stir.
Put-in the pineapple chunk, red bell pepper, scallions, carrots, and broccoli.
Continue to stir-fry for 5 to 8 minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste.
Transfer to a serving plate.
Serve. Share and enjoy!
ingredients: 2 lbs. pork sliced into thin pieces
1 medium red bell pepper sliced into strips

recipes.title: Bread Making Courses
recipes.description: Pastries, breads, cakes, and a whole lot of varieties of baked goods: these are just some of life’s simple pleasures that are impossible to refuse. Breads and baked products have that delightful smell, the aroma that fills the air and the sumptuous taste that excites the palette. It is true that baking and making bread can be a good hobby. But what if you would like to turn this simple past-time to a business venture?

recipes.title: Arugula Salad with Chopped Walnuts
recipes.description: Arugula Salad is a strong tasting salad that is low in calories. Have you tried arugula before? If not, this article about arugula might help you get acquainted with this vegetable.
instructions: Combine salt and olive oil. Mix well and then set aside.
In a large salad bowl, combine arugula, cherry tomato, and walnuts. Gently toss the ingredients.
Add the olive oil mixture and white wine vinegar. Toss once more to incorporate all the ingredients.
Serve. Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: What Is Arugula?
recipes.description: A lot of people are unaware of what arugula is. Even those who frequently indulge in fresh salad are sometimes oblivious that arugula is already included in what they are eating. What is arugula?

recipes.title: Carne Asada Recipe
recipes.description: Carne Asada refers to marinated and grilled beef pieces. These are usually thin cuts of steaks such as skirt steak or flank steak. This carne asada recipe requires the steak to be marinated in olive oil with some seasonings and spices overnight to properly absorb the flavor.
instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine olive oil, garlic, cumin, cilantro, lime juice, salt, sugar, and pepper. Mix well.
Add the skirt steak and coat with the mixture. Let it stay overnight.
Heat-up your grill and then grill both sides of the steak until it turns medium rare. Do not grill for a long time so that the meat will not get tough.
Remove the steak from the grill and then let it rest. Slice the Carne Asada into desired size.
Serve as an ingredient of quesadilla, tacos, or burritos. You can even eat this with rice.
Share and enjoy!

recipes.title: Carb Lovers Diet
recipes.description: The Carb Lovers Diet is all about eating the right carbohydrate rich food as part of a healthy meal.
